input.sentences: last night 's party was a lot of fun . all my closest friends came out .

we put a playlist on and also did a little dancing .
from the `` waterhose '' to the `` monkey '' ... no lame dance move was off limit !
[male] being [male] . we were all wiped out by the end of the night . wiped out from a joyous | entertaining time .
output.sentences: Last night we all had a lot to drink at Joey's party.
The party was fun and my single male friend might of found the love of his life.
The music on Joey's playlist was cheesy but that didn't stop anyone from dancing.
The cheesy music made us perform fitting dance moves like the water hose and the monkey.
We were all wiped by the end of the night but it was worth it for a great time.
